title: Simulator Mega-Pack
description:
A large collection of various simulators and simulation games.

Included:

- Bagger Simulator 2011
- Bus and Cable Car Simulator: San Francisco
- Crane Simulator 2009
- Euro Truck Simulator 2
- Forklift Truck Simulator 2009
- Garbage Truck Simulator
- Lemonade Deluxe
- Oil Platform Simulator
- OMSI Bus Simulator
- Pontifex 2 (Bridge Builder)
- Real Lives 2007
- Receiver rc6 (Pistol Simulator)
- Road Construction Simulator
- Sail Simulator 2010
- Ski Region Simulator 2012
- Stone Quarry Simulator
- Street Cleaning Simulator
- The Political Machine
- Woodcutter Simulator 2012



Thanks to all the other groups who originally ripped these games, and a big thanks to the people who made these games. REMEMBER! If you enjoy these games make sure to buy them!
